abstract: Driven column review of 2016 Hyundai Tucson.
lead_paragraph: Thirty years ago Americans were even unsure how to say Hyundai’s name, but the carmaker’s latest entry in the crossover class is worthy of attention.

headline.main: Video Review: Hyundai’s Tucson Holds Its Own in a Class of Heavy Hitters
headline.print_headline: Tucson Holds Its Own in a Tough Class

snippet: Thirty years ago Americans were even unsure how to say Hyundai’s name, but the carmaker’s latest entry in the crossover class is worthy of attention.
